# UIAlertViewStyle.plainTextInput

**Case**

An alert that allows the user to enter text.

## Declaration

```swift
case plainTextInput
```

## Constants

- **UIAlertViewStyle.default**: A standard alert.
- **UIAlertViewStyle.secureTextInput**: An alert that allows the user to enter text. The text field is obscured.
- **UIAlertViewStyle.loginAndPasswordInput**: An alert that allows the user to enter a login identifier and password.

items.description: An alert that allows the user to enter text. The text field is obscured.
